reviewText: I purchased this DVD in the wake of a recommendation, and thoroughly enjoyed it upon revisiting this classic sci fi classic.  In my case, the recommendation came via an interview concerning my favorite movie of all times, Ender's Game.  In an interview I saw featuring Asa Butterfield who is a totally cool and awesome actor, he mentioned that he is a sci fi fan and the Matrix was his favorite movie; so I figured I ought to get my own copy of this movie to revisit it, as I had seen it years ago already.  I was glad that I obtained this DVD, as in watching it again so many years later I really enjoyed it with greater understanding and appreciation.  Thanks, Asa!
Great Movie. My original DVD which I bought 7 years ago wouldn't play in one of my DVD drives. This DVD works well.
as advertised. prompt delivery. zero complaints.
and plays perfectly.  A sweet movie I always enjoy.  Now I'll enjoy it more often. :)  Great seller and fast shipping.
I believe this movie will stand the test of time. It is with out a doubt a master piece. It tells a story that may just be relevant to us in this day and time in which we live.
Amazing movie.. Tectonic shift in movie making....  Thumbs up wachowski brothers u rock...!!
